name: auth-service
author: zineof
description: Demonstration of protecting API gateway endpoints with auth0

scripts.dep: npm run build && sls deploy -v --stage dev
scripts.i:dev: yarn add -D serverless-pseudo-parameters @babel/core @babel/preset-env @babel/preset-typescript @babel/plugin-transform-runtime webpack webpack-cli babel-loader fork-ts-checker-webpack-plugin typescript @types/node @types/aws-lambda @types/http-errors
